pullRequest.title: add popup message explaining the offline finds counter
pullRequest.bodyText:
fixes #8938
I created a small framework which could be used for other one-time messages as well. The state if the message was already shown is stored in the ExtentionsDB. This framework could also be used for showing introduction messages for new users, new important functions to be highlighted or other stuff like that... just thinking ;-)
main functions:
public static DialogStatus getStatus(final DialogType dialogType, final DialogStatus defaultStatus) { }

public static void setStatus(final DialogType dialogType, final DialogStatus status) { }

DialogType and DialogStatus are two enum's which could be amend later on...


(of course this message get's only shown one single time)
I tested it quite a lot so no bugs should be expected...
If this is ready to merge textual and codewise, a would like to add a german translation to strings-de.xml to have a translation for the country with most of our users.  (Which should be overwritten at master by Crowdin without merge conflicts I hope)
